title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: When performing the SaveAs operation, the file type is not remembered. Additionally, the icon for the file has changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the file (e.g., move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
4) A dialog will appear
5) Browse for a valid container location
6) Type the filename without specifying the extension
7) Click Ok

Observed Behavior:
The Navigator adds the file in the specified location, but does not show the file extension.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the file (e.g., move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
4) A dialog will appear
5) Browse for a valid container location
6) Type the filename without specifying the extension
7) Click Ok

Expected Behavior:
The Navigator should add the file in the specified location and display the file extension.
